data.name: t
data.doc: The real number type representing arbitrary precision real numbers
data.pattern: Representing exact decimal numbers without floating point imprecision

data.name: of_int
data.doc: Converts an integer [i] to a real number
data.pattern: Converting integer values to real numbers for exact decimal arithmetic

data.name: _to_int_round_down
data.doc: Converts a real number [r] to an integer by rounding down. Internal helper function.
data.pattern: Internal function for floor rounding in integer conversion

data.name: to_int
data.doc: Converts a real number [r] to an integer by rounding towards zero
data.pattern: Converting real numbers to integers when decimal precision is no longer needed
Performing exact decimal addition without floating point errors
Performing exact decimal subtraction without floating point errors
Changing the sign of a real number while preserving its magnitude
Performing exact decimal multiplication without floating point errors
Performing exact decimal division without floating point errors

data.doc: Tests if one real number is less than another
data.pattern: Comparing real numbers for strict ordering relationships

data.doc: Tests if one real number is less than or equal to another
data.pattern: Comparing real numbers for non-strict ordering relationships

data.doc: Tests if one real number is greater than another
data.pattern: Comparing real numbers for strict ordering relationships

data.doc: Tests if one real number is greater than or equal to another
data.pattern: Comparing real numbers for non-strict ordering relationships

data.name: abs
data.doc: Returns the absolute value of real number [r]
data.pattern: Getting the magnitude of a real number regardless of sign

data.name: min
data.doc: Returns the minimum of two real numbers
data.pattern: Finding the smaller of two real numbers in comparisons

data.name: max
data.doc: Returns the maximum of two real numbers
data.pattern: Finding the larger of two real numbers in comparisons

data.name: of_float
data.doc: Converts a float [f] to a real number
data.pattern: Converting approximate floating point numbers to exact real numbers

data.name: pow
data.doc: Raises real number [base] to integer power [exp]
data.pattern: Computing exact integer powers of real numbers
